SOM_Seq_Sim: Documentation & Walkthroughs
==========================================

Welcome to SOM_Seq_Sim's documentation! Within this webpage, you can find a 
summary of our repo, an overview of our data, multiple Jupyter Notebook 
tutorials, information for contributing to the project, and descriptions of 
the core functions within the program. 

Each function is also added to an alphabetical index, available at the bottom 
of this page. 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Project Overview

   ../README.md
   data_overview.md
   modules

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Setup & Walkthroughs

   install
   generate_data
   make_soms
   walkthrough

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Resources

   references.md
   Link to Github <https://github.com/caterer-z-t/SOM_Seq_Sim>
   ../CONTRIBUTING.md
   ../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md
